<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="7" android:background="@drawable/rounded_bottom" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Header Title --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Cài đặt" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#5A5A5A" android:layout_gravity="start" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:fontFamily="@font/nunito_regular" android:paddingBottom="16dp" />
<!-- Notification Toggle --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginLeft="10dp" android:layout_marginRight="30dp" android:paddingVertical="8dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Thông Báo" android:fontFamily="@font/nunito_semibold" android:textColor="@color/Light_Background_BgAccent" android:textSize="16sp" />
<Switch android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:checked="true" android:theme="@style/mySwitch" android:thumb="@drawable/baseline_brightness_1_24" android:track="@drawable/track_selector" android:padding="1dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Account Option --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginLeft="10dp" android:layout_marginRight="20dp" android:paddingVertical="8dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Tài khoản" android:textSize="16sp" android:fontFamily="@font/nunito_semibold" android:textColor="@color/Light_Background_BgAccent" />
<ImageView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:src="@drawable/ic_arrow_down" android:layout_margin="10dp" android:padding="1dp" app:tint="#5A5A5A"/> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Terms Option --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginLeft="10dp" android:layout_marginRight="20dp" android:paddingVertical="8dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Điều khoản" android:textSize="16sp" android:fontFamily="@font/nunito_semibold" android:textColor="@color/Light_Background_BgAccent" />
<ImageView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:src="@drawable/ic_arrow_down" android:layout_margin="10dp" android:padding="1dp" app:tint="#5A5A5A"/> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Language Option --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginLeft="10dp" android:layout_marginRight="20dp" android:paddingVertical="8dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Ngôn ngữ" android:textSize="16sp" android:fontFamily="@font/nunito_semibold" android:textColor="@color/Light_Background_BgAccent" />
<ImageView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:src="@drawable/ic_arrow_down" android:layout_margin="10dp" android:padding="1dp" app:tint="#5A5A5A"/> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Rank Option --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginLeft="10dp" android:layout_marginRight="20dp" android:paddingVertical="8dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Hạng" android:textSize="16sp" android:fontFamily="@font/nunito_semibold" android:textColor="@color/Light_Background_BgAccent" />
<ImageView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:src="@drawable/ic_arrow_down" android:layout_margin="10dp" android:padding="1dp" app:tint="#5A5A5A"/> </LinearLayout>
<!-- App Info Option --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Thông tin ứng dụng" android:textSize="16sp" android:layout_marginLeft="10dp" android:textColor="@color/Light_Background_BgAccent" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:fontFamily="@font/nunito_semibold" android:paddingVertical="8dp" />
<!-- Button at the end --> <Button android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Lưu Cài Đặt" android:backgroundTint="@color/Accent_Color" <!-- Change the button color as needed --> android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" /> <!-- Margin above the button --> </LinearLayout>
